japanese: プロレス同好会の/エキジビジョンマッチなんてどう？/グラウンドでやるみたいよ。
english: How about the wrestling club's /exhibition match? /They're doing it on the grounds.

japanese: プロレス同好会の/エキジビジョンマッチなんてどうだ？/グラウンドでやるみたいだぞ。
english: How about the wrestling club's /exhibition match? /They're doing it on the grounds.

japanese: フム……/確かにそういう意見もあるが、/それは浅い考え方だ。
english: Hmm... /certainly such opinions exist, /but that's shallow thinking.

japanese: フリーマーケットさ。/みんなからいらないモノを集めて、/クラスのヤツらで売るんだよ。
english: Flea market. /Collecting unwanted items from everyone /and selling them with the class.

japanese: ホラ……、ちゃんと炎を見て……。/僕と一緒にいたいんですよね……？
english: Look... watch the flames... /You want to be with me, right...?

japanese: ボクはこの一年で、多少の力と/引き替えに責任を負ったんだ……。/それを果たさないとな……。
english: This past year, I gained some power /in exchange for responsibility... /I must fulfill it...

japanese: プッ！/ナニ、これ〜〜っ！/小学生でも、もっとうまいよ！
english: Pfft! /What is this~~! /Even elementary kids are better!

japanese: ブラブラしにプールに来たらよ/金魚が泳いでたんで、眺めてたんだ。
english: Came to the pool to hang out, /goldfish were swimming, so I watched.

japanese: ボクもやりたかったが、/残念だな。/去年は楽しかったからね。
english: I wanted to do it too, /but unfortunately. /Last year was fun.

japanese: フフフ……。/で？　何のご用？
english: Hehehe... /and? What do you need?

japanese: プッ！/何だよ、これ〜〜っ！/小学生でも、もっとうまいぞ！
english: Pfft! /What is this~~! /Even elementary kids are better!

japanese: ホントにな。/こんなに天気がいいと、/打撃練習がしたくなるぜ！
english: Really. /With weather this nice, /I want to do batting practice!

japanese: フン……見逃すとは大きく出たな。/言い換えれば、/いつでも阻止できるという事か？
english: Hmph... bold to say you'll let it pass. /In other words, /you can stop it anytime?

japanese: ブツブツ……ひと煮立ちさせて……/塩ひとつまみ……具体的に書いてよ……/……ブツブツブツブツ……
english: Mutter... bring to a boil... /pinch of salt... write specifically... /...mutter mutter...

japanese: ホゥ……なるほど。/それは確かに興味深い。
english: Hmm... I see. /That's certainly interesting.

japanese: ホントか！？/よぉし、じゃあ二人で頑張ろうぜ！
english: Really!? /Alright, let's work hard together!

japanese: フフフ……。/それもいいわね！/じゃあ、お願いね！
english: Hehehe... /that's fine too! /Well then, please!

japanese: フフフ……。/ほら、しっかりしてください。
english: Hehehe... /come on, pull yourself together.

japanese: フフフ……。素敵でしょ？/クラスの皆さんとやる喫茶店の/衣装なんですよ。
english: Hehehe... lovely, right? /It's the costume for the cafe /with our class.

japanese: ボードゲーム用の名前を登録してね！
english: Register a name for the board game!

japanese: フフフ……。/ちょっと休憩中！
english: Hehehe... /on a little break!

japanese: ホントは、シルバーを使いたいところだが、/そうもいかねェんでな。/今回は木製だ。
english: Actually, I'd like to use silver, but /can't do that. /This time it's wooden.
